name: AUDIO_MIXING_REASON_TYPE
description: The reason why the playback state of the music file changes. Reported in the AUDIO_MIXING_STATE_CHANGED callback.

parameters.AUDIO_MIXING_REASON_CAN_NOT_OPEN:
701: The SDK cannot open the music file. For example, the local music file
                        does not exist, the SDK does not support the file format, or  the SDK cannot
                        access the music file URL.

parameters.AUDIO_MIXING_REASON_TOO_FREQUENT_CALL: 702: The SDK opens the music file too frequently. If you need to call startAudioMixing multiple times, ensure that the call interval is more than 500 ms.

parameters.AAUDIO_MIXING_REASON_INTERRUPTED_EOF: 703: The music file playback is interrupted.

parameters.AUDIO_MIXING_REASON_STARTED_BY_USER:
720: The method call of startAudioMixing to play music
                        files succeeds.

parameters.AUDIO_MIXING_REASON_ONE_LOOP_COMPLETED: 721: The music file completes a loop playback.

parameters.AUDIO_MIXING_REASON_START_NEW_LOOP: 722: The music file starts a new loop playback.

parameters.AUDIO_MIXING_REASON_ALL_LOOPS_COMPLETED: 723: The music file completes all loop playbacks.

parameters.AUDIO_MIXING_REASON_STOPPED_BY_USER:
724: The method call of stopAudioMixing to stop playing the
                        music file succeeds.

parameters.AUDIO_MIXING_REASON_PAUSED_BY_USER:
725: The method call of pauseAudioMixing to pause playing
                        the music file succeeds.

parameters.AUDIO_MIXING_REASON_RESUMED_BY_USER:
726: The method call of resumeAudioMixing to resume playing
                        the music file succeeds.
